sentences.en: A: Yes , you can. Here's the checkbook.
sentences.cn: 当然 可以. 给你,我现在可以填写支票了吗?

sentences.en: Checkbook : a book containing blank checks issued by a bank.
sentences.cn: 空白支票簿: 银行签发的空白支票簿.

sentences.en: Checkbook pocket is top - loading for top - tearing ( standard & duplicate ) checkbooks.
sentences.cn: 支票簿口袋是顶级的顶级撕裂 ( 标准 及 重复加载 ) 支票簿.

sentences.en: For a quick check on your heart, check out your checkbook.
sentences.cn: 要想快速检查你的心, 那就先检查你的支票簿.

sentences.en: Get your own coffee, balance your own checkbook, and do your own holiday shopping.
sentences.cn: 你应该自己去拿咖啡, 自己结算自己的收入, 自己为度假购物.

sentences.en: He detached a check from the checkbook.
sentences.cn: 他从支票簿上撕下一张支票。

sentences.en: He knows she's proud of the checkbook.
sentences.cn: 他知道这支票是她心上的宝贝.

sentences.en: Here is your checkbook.
sentences.cn: 给您支票簿.

sentences.en: I balance my checkbook every weekend.
sentences.cn: 我每个周末都结算我的支票簿.

sentences.en: I didn't have my checkbook with me so I paid in cash.
sentences.cn: 我没带支票簿就用现钱结账了.

sentences.en: I'll get a checkbook and a receipt for you.
sentences.cn: 我替你去拿支票来和收据.

sentences.en: If you're not using your smile, you're like a man with a million dollars in the bank and no checkbook.
sentences.cn: 如果你不使用你的微笑，你就好比是个有百万美元存款却没有支票簿的人。

sentences.en: It's unwise to wager on retrieving the lost checkbook.
sentences.cn: 指望找回丢失的支票本是不明智的.

sentences.en: Oh, by the way, it will positively impact your checkbook too.
sentences.cn: 哦，顺便说一下，这对你的支票簿也会产生积极的影响。

sentences.en: Open the checkbook, and protests will stop.
sentences.cn: 打开支票簿，抗议活动即将停止。

sentences.en: Teach someone a useful skill – cooking, changing a tire, balancing a checkbook.
sentences.cn: 教给他人一项有用的技术——例如烹调、拆换轮胎，平衡支票簿。

sentences.en: The checkbook cover removable and there is a loop for a pen.
sentences.cn: 支票簿盖可拆卸,有一支钢笔循环.

sentences.en: The checkbook stubs don't tally with my Bank statement.
sentences.cn: 支票薄存根与我的银行对账单不相符合.

sentences.en: The man who steals your checkbook and signs your name to one of the checks has committed the offense of forgery, for which he may be penalized by fine and imprisonment.
sentences.cn: 偷了你的支票簿并在其中的一张支票上冒签了你姓名的人，已经犯了伪造罪，并因此可判处罚金和有期徒刑。

sentences.en: This checkbook cover will hold either type of personal checks.
sentences.cn: 本支票簿封面将举行个人支票的类型之一.

sentences.en: Travel Goods, Document Bags , Computer Bags , CD Cases , Organizers, Wallet, Checkbook.
sentences.cn: 采购产品旅行用品, 文件袋, 电脑袋, CD盒, 钱包, 支票簿.
